root.name: Super Ubie Land
root.description: OverviewDr. Terrestrial has trapped Ubie on Climate Island and now Ubie has to escape, fix his spaceship and get back home.The game is coming to PC/Mac and Linux in 2013 with a Wii U eShop version brought over by Maestro Interactive Games. Super Ubi Land was successfully funded with Kickstarter on April 18, 2012.The game was originally called Super Ubi Land until Ubisoft came a-knocking which forced Notion Games to change Ubi to Ubie.
